description.narrative: Child protection mechanisms at different levels established with adequate resources, to articulate, coordinate and provide services to prevent and respond to child rights violation, including gender based violence, abuse, exploitation and neglect., which contributes to Access To Justice, Birth Registration, Child Protection And Emergencies, Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children (Covid), Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2019, girls and boys benefit from and access decentralized child protection mechanisms and programmes that prevent and protect them from violation of rights, primarily violence, abuse, exploitation and neglect.
